attributes.action: Randomly search everyone in knife crime “hot spots”
attributes.background: Knife crime has hit epidemic proportions & is not only killing many people , the threat of knife crime terrifies everyone. The rise in people carrying knives is a trend & it can be reversed . A bold move needs to be taken & I am convinced the public would support this.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because this would an operational decision for the police and not the UK Government and Parliament.
